name: The Land of Peace
description:
A Land of Peace is a short game made using Unity 3D. It is a product of a student game jam event. This game carries an anti-war message.

Disclaimer!

This game is still under development and unfinished. The game is currently stuck in a loop bug.

Story

The game begins with a 5-year-old girl, waking up lonely, with a rabbit soft toy, in a collapsed house. It took place from a country in Middle East in war. The girl began her adventure with the guide of a spirit ball light. She went through bombing and collapsing houses with a faith "to find the land of peace".

Controls

W A S D: move character

Space: jump

F: picking up

Mouse: camera control

Cautions

The game has a war theme. It brings sad and sorrow atmosphere.

This game is not working and loops the first part forever

Team

Game Design: Miles Do

Animation: Jerry Kovanen

Programming: Suat Demirel, Valtteri Yli-Olli, ALexander Wingqvist

Music: Mira Oja

*The game is created for ConBITi Games Jam with the theme is "peace".
